articles.content:
Fancy yourself as a bit of an explorer? Then best pay very close attention to Dr Kathy Sullivan.
Not only is she the first American woman to walk in space, but shes also *deep breath* one of the ast… [+5757 chars]
articles.description: Ahead of the launch of Lego's Discovery shuttle set, the first American woman to walk in space explains why diversity is key to the success of place exploration.
articles.title: Why it's critical the first crew on Mars contains a woman, according to former astronaut Dr Kathy Sullivan - BBC Focus Magazine

articles.content:
Ineos Team UK helmsman Sir Ben Ainslie has revealed why he believes Team New Zealand are the best - and has welcomed reports of a one-off America's Cup challenge in the UK.

articles.description: Team UK skipper Sir Ben Ainslie lifts lid on Team NZ and plans for the next cup cycle.
articles.title: America's Cup: Sir Ben Ainslie lifts lid on Team New Zealand and Ineos Team UK's plans for next cup cycle - New Zealand Herald
